name: Margo Gru (Despicable Me)
description:
Margo Gru, lil' girl but the oldest out of 3 from Despicable Me

Use margo to summon her, use brown hair, brown eyes, glasses, low ponytail, sidelocks to form her head, use jacket, skirt, sneakers to summon her default attire, you can omit the clothing tag below the waist if you want to make portrait tag to work well.

meta.prompt: 1girl, female child, margo, brown hair, brown eyes, glasses, low ponytail, sidelocks, jacket, skirt, sneakers, city, river, sitting, looking at viewer, :d <lora:margo:1>
